name: Roots & Veggies
description:
Roots & Veggies is a game where you attempt to create a dish using different root vegetables in the most artistic way possible. Your Food Critic? A Game AI. 

With 5 different root vegetables, create endless food art combinations. Add many of one veggie type or one of each kind!

Gameplay GIF


Controls:

To add root vegetables to the screen, press the key associated with the vegetable.  

  • T for Turnip
  • B for Beets
  • R for Radish
  • C for Carrot
  • O for Onion

To place a root vegetable - Left Mouse Button Click 

To move the root vegetables - Mouse Drag

To delete a root vegetable - Drag and drop to the trash can icon

Multiple Creative Possibilities:

Make a face, a house, or even a landscape!

Credits:

Art, Music, and Programming by Sabiha Shaik. 

Picnic Blanket Background from Adobe Express.

Note: Made during 48 hours of the Global Game Jam 2023.
